policy_statements.AM-01: Organization maintains an inventory of information systems
policy_statements.AM-02: Organization maintains an inventory of application assets

implementation_requirements.AM-01:
1. Maintain current inventory
2. Review quarterly
3. Document changes
implementation_requirements.AM-02:
1. Document all applications
2. Review monthly
3. Track versions
implementation_requirements.AM-03:
1. Perform network scans
2. Compare with inventory
3. Assign ownership
